text: Segunda División B is a football league which is the third division in Spain. == Structure == The league is made of 4 groups of 20 teams, making the amount of total teams 80 in all. === Promotion === In each group, the top 6 teams qualify for the Copa Del Rey. The 2nd, 3rd, and 4th placed teams qualify for playoffs to be promoted to Segunda Division. The 1st placed team has to play a playoff with the champions of other groups and the winner is declared champion. === Relegation === In each group, the bottom 4 teams are directly sent to the Tercera División. The 16th placed teams in each group compete against each other. The worst of those teams is relegated. ==Groups== Group I Group II Group III Group IV * Atlético Baleares * Atlético Madrid B * Celta B * Coruxo * Getafe B * Ibiza * Internacional * Langreo * Las Palmas Atlético * Las Rozas * Marino Luanco * Melilla * Oviedo B * Peña Deportiva * Pontevedra * Racing Ferrol * Rayo Majadahonda * Real Madrid Castilla * San Sebastián de los Reyes * Sporting Gijón B * Alavés B * Amorebieta * Arenas * Athletic Bilbao B * Barakaldo * Burgos * Calahorra * Cultural Leonesa * Guijuelo * Haro * Izarra * Leioa * Osasuna B * Real Sociedad B * Real Unión * Salamanca CF * Tudelano * UD Logroñés * Unionistas * Valladolid Promesas * Andorra * Atlético Levante * Badalona * Barcelona B * Castellón * Cornellà * Ebro * Ejea * Espanyol B * Gimnàstic * Hércules * La Nucía * Llagostera * Lleida Esportiu * Olot * Orihuela * Prat * Sabadell * Valencia Mestalla * Villarreal B * Algeciras * Atlético Sanluqueño * Badajoz * Cádiz B * Cartagena * Córdoba * Don Benito * Linense * Marbella * Mérida * Murcia * Recreativo * Recreativo Granada * San Fernando * Sevilla Atlético * Talavera de la Reina * UCAM Murcia * Villarrobledo * Villarrubia * Yeclano == Group winners == These are all the group winners ever. The promoted group winners are in bold. Note: Since the 2008-09 season, the champion has been decided in a playoffs round. The winner of the playoffs final is highlighted in gold. The loser of the playoffs final is highlighted in silver.
